title: It's this logo in bitmap format, and I have to recreate this logo using the same fonts..the first letter 'B' was identified as Brush Script MT but the second one 'c' could not be identified..Please help..
author: qwertyuiop116

comments.content: You can start with the lowercase /c of **[Courier (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417090520/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=Courier%20-%20Bold&fid=a372fc7bd52e0effb5e259e770229d26&fsize=60&text=c&fit=1)** and modify it - if needed
